allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add GPU acceleration support \(Vulkan/CUDA\) v0.2.0

- Add Vulkan backend support for AMD/Intel/NVIDIA GPUs
- Add CUDA backend support for NVIDIA GPUs \(optional\)
- Add GPU settings in config \(gpu_enabled, gpu_backend\)
- Add GPU toggle in Settings UI
- Add get_gpu_info Tauri command for runtime GPU detection
- Update whisper-rs to 0.14 for Vulkan SDK 1.4 compatibility
- Add build script for GPU variants \(scripts/build-gpu.ps1\)
- Add GPU setup documentation \(docs/GPU_SETUP.md\)

Build with: cargo build --features gpu-vulkan \(AMD/Intel/NVIDIA\)
Build with: cargo build --features gpu-cuda \(NVIDIA only\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
